actions.committee: House Committee on Ways and Means
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Ways and Means.

official_title: A bill to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1954 to increase the penalties for the unlawful transportation of narcotic drugs, and to make it unlawful to solicit the assistance of or use a person under the age of 18 in the unlawful trafficking of any such drug.

summary.text: Increases, under the Internal Revenue Code of 1954, the penalties for the unlawful transportation of narcotic drugs to a 10-year minimum imprisonment term. Makes it unlawful to solicit the assistance of or use a person under the age of 18 in the unlawful trafficking of any such drug.

titles.title: A bill to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1954 to increase the penalties for the unlawful transportation of narcotic drugs, and to make it unlawful to solicit the assistance of or use a person under the age of 18 in the unlawful trafficking of any such drug.
